mapper.select: select server_name as name, cpuLoad, typeId, diskSize/(1024*1024*1024) as diskSize, diskUsed/(1024*1024*1024) as diskUsed, memSize/(1024*1024*1024) as memSize, memUsed/(1024*1024*1024) as memUsed, (diskSize-diskUsed)/(1024*1024*1024) as diskResidue, (memSize-memUsed)/(1024*1024*1024) as memResidue, runStatus as status, time,type from xhgmnet_eastcom_server
mapper.update: update xhgmnet_eastcom_server set alarmStatus=0 where (memUsed/(1024*1024*1024))/(memSize/(1024*1024*1024)) < 0.9 and (diskUsed/(1024*1024*1024))/(diskSize/(1024*1024*1024)) < 0.9
update xhgmnet_eastcom_server set alarmStatus=1 where (memUsed/(1024*1024*1024))/(memSize/(1024*1024*1024)) >= 0.9 or (diskUsed/(1024*1024*1024))/(diskSize/(1024*1024*1024)) >= 0.9
mapper.select: select count(*) from xhgmnet_eastcom_server where ((memUsed/(1024*1024*1024))/(memSize/(1024*1024*1024))>=0.9 or (diskUsed/(1024*1024*1024))/(diskSize/(1024*1024*1024))>=0.9) and typeId=1 and alarmStatus=0
